techmeme.title: Intel says it will sell a 51% stake in Altera to Silver Lake, valuing the programmable chip unit at $8.7B; Intel bought Altera for $15B in 2015 (Zaheer Kachwala/Reuters)
NATO acquires Palantir's Maven Smart System, which uses generative AI, ML, and LLMs to provide "commanders with a secure, common operational capability" (Financial Times)
African Private Capital Association: VC inflows to Africa fell 22% YoY to $3.6B in 2024, after a 31% YoY drop in 2023; fintechs had 116 deals raising $1.4B (Ruth Olurounbi/Bloomberg)
Global smartphone sales grew 3% YoY in Q1 2025; Apple took the top spot, its first ever for Q1, with a 19% share, and Vivo was the fastest growing brand (Counterpoint Research)
How private prison company Geo Group built a lucrative side business making digital tools like smart watches and tracking apps to help ICE surveil immigrants (New York Times)
